name: Odyssey to Ω
description:
Odyssey to Omega is a single-player 2D platformer game designed during a Game Jam by a team of 6 students in a matter of 2 and a half days. Set on a fantastical ship journeying endlessly through the retro-futuristic cosmos, it follows an astronaut trying to survive deep space and keep his vessel intact. He’s doomed to encounter things far more frightening than meteors and rocks, such as lunar hydras.

In-Depth Game Description

  • Infinite RPG adventure with customizable features
  • Exhilarating physics-based gameplay
  • Hand-drawn terrain inspired by the epic poems of Homer’s Odyssey
  • Beautifully stylized and evocative visual design, inspired by the old time paper theater
  • Different environmental hazards, including space rock rain, comets, and meteors

The gameplay is based on a series of two-dimensional screens presenting obstacles that require strategy, precision and a quick reaction time from the player in order to be overcome.

The chosen themes are:

  • Back to the future
  • Retell a tale

The Holy Salad team consists of:

  • Adelia Zemdihanova
  • Dora Kiss
  • Boglarka Kiss
  • Alejandro Batalla
  • Genadi Dimitrov
  • Christian Matte
